title: Cultured Marble Counters in This 2x2 Apartment!
posting_body: Welcome Home to Alvin's Corner on Penny Lane in Campbell!
The luxury community of Alvin’s Corner invites you to lease one of the lofts and apartments in studio, one-, two-, and three-bedroom floor plans.
Lofty ceilings and open-concept layouts create spacious and airy interiors.
Many come with island breakfast bars that connect kitchens to living and dining areas.
Certain floor plans feature bay windows, perfect as reading nooks.
Some also offer balconies with trellis, great for outdoor leisure.
For added convenience, select models offer huge dens.
Walk-in or wall-to wall closets, as well as laundry rooms with washers and dryers, are available in some floor plans as well.
To make parking easier, the community offers a gated underground garage with designated parking spaces.
Ample guest parking are also available.
For added comfort, Alvin’s Corner has an expansive rooftop deck that’s ideal for stargazing.
You also have excellent views of the Santa Cruz Mountains.
Pricing and availability subject to change.
To see our privacy policy visit <URL>
